parties: Michael J. PISKANIN, (a/k/a Michael John Piskanin, Jr.), Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, (Herein: PADOC); and Jeffrey A. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of January, 2010, the Petition for Review and the Application for Bail are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
989 A.2d 881
Michael J. PISKANIN, (a/k/a Michael John Piskanin, Jr.), Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, (Herein: PADOC); and Jeffrey A. Beard; Individually and as Secretary of PADOC (Herein: Beard); and Kenneth Cameron, Individually and as Superintendent SCI Cresson (Herein: “Cameron”); and All of Them, Individually, Jointly and Severally with One Another, and All of Them with Their Subordinates, Employees and Agents, Respondents.

Jan. 4, 2010.
